mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee ( emp_id, emp_num, emp_hire, emp_nm, emp_gd, emp_birth, emp_pw, emp_phone, emp_email, emp_add, emp_da, emp_sts_cd, emp_pc, emp_cat_cd, emp_pos_cd, emp_dep_cd, emp_team_cd,emp_img, meg_num ) VALUES ( emp_seq.NEXTVAL, emp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{emp_hire, jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_gd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_birth, jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp_pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_add, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_da, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'emp_sts_01', #{emp_pc, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{empCatCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPosCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empDepCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empTeamCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meg_num, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT emp_num, emp_nm, emp_phone, emp_hire FROM employee ORDER BY emp_num asc
SELECT emp_cat_cd, emp_pos_cd, emp_dep_cd, emp_team_cd, emp_sts_cd FROM employee
SELECT det_id, det_nm FROM code_detail WHERE cod_id IN ('cat' ,'dep', 'pos', 'team','sts') OR cod_id LIKE 'dep%'

SELECT CASE WHEN COD_ID = 'cat' THEN DET_ID ELSE NULL END AS "empCatCd", CASE WHEN COD_ID = 'pos' THEN DET_ID ELSE NULL END AS "empPosCd", CASE WHEN COD_ID LIKE 'dep%' THEN DET_ID ELSE NULL END AS "empDepCd", CASE WHEN COD_ID = 'team' THEN DET_ID ELSE NULL END AS "empTeamCd", CASE WHEN COD_ID = 'sts' THEN DET_ID ELSE NULL END AS "empStsCd", DET_ID AS "codeValue", DET_NM AS "codeName" FROM code_detail WHERE COD_ID IN ('cat', 'pos', 'team', 'sts') OR COD_ID LIKE 'dep%' ORDER BY COD_ID, DET_ID

SELECT emp_id AS "empId", emp_num AS "empNum", emp_nm AS "empNm", emp_phone AS "empPhone", emp_hire AS "empHire", emp_cat_cd AS "empCatCd", emp_pos_cd AS "empPosCd", emp_dep_cd AS "empDepCd", emp_team_cd AS "empTeamCd", emp_sts_cd AS "empStsCd", EMP_ADD AS "empAdd", TO_CHAR(EMP_BIRTH, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "empBirth", EMP_DA AS "empDa", EMP_EMAIL AS "empEmail", EMP_GD AS "empGd", EMP_PC AS "empPc", EMP_PW AS "empPw" FROM employee WHERE 1=1
AND emp_sts_cd IN ('sts_01', 'sts_02', 'sts_03')
AND emp_sts_cd = 'sts_01'
AND emp_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND emp_num LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY emp_num ASC

SELECT emp_id AS "empId", emp_num AS "empNum", emp_nm AS "empNm", emp_phone AS "empPhone", TO_CHAR(emp_hire,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "empHire", cat.det_nm AS "empCatCd", pos.det_nm AS "empPosCd", dep.det_nm AS "empDepCd", team.det_nm AS "empTeamCd", sts.det_nm AS "empStsCd", EMP_ADD AS "empAdd", TO_CHAR(EMP_BIRTH, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "empBirth", EMP_DA AS "empDa", EMP_EMAIL AS "empEmail", EMP_GD AS "empGd", EMP_PC AS "empPc", EMP_PW AS "empPw" FROM employee e left JOIN code_detail cat ON e.emp_cat_cd = cat.det_id AND cat.cod_id = 'cat' left JOIN code_detail pos ON e.emp_pos_cd = pos.det_id AND pos.cod_id = 'pos' left JOIN code_detail dep ON e.emp_dep_cd = dep.det_id AND dep.cod_id in ('dep_erp', 'dep_mes') left JOIN code_detail team ON e.emp_team_cd = team.det_id AND team.cod_id = 'team' left JOIN code_detail sts ON e.emp_sts_cd = sts.det_id AND sts.cod_id = 'sts' ORDER BY emp_num asc
SELECT det_id AS "DET_ID", det_nm AS "DET_NM" FROM code_detail WHERE cod_id in('cat', 'pos', 'dep_erp', 'dep_mes', 'team')

SELECT emp_id AS "empId", emp_num AS "EMP_NUM", emp_nm AS "EMP_NM", emp_phone AS "EMP_PHONE", emp_hire AS "EMP_HIRE", emp_cat_cd AS "EMP_CAT_CD", emp_pos_cd AS "EMP_POS_CD", emp_dep_cd AS "EMP_DEP_CD", emp_team_cd AS "EMP_TEAM_CD", EMP_ADD AS "EMP_ADD", EMP_BIRTH AS "EMP_BIRTH", EMP_DA AS "EMP_DA", EMP_EMAIL AS "EMP_EMAIL", EMP_GD AS "EMP_GD", EMP_PC AS "EMP_PC" FROM employee WHERE TRIM(emp_num) = #{empNum}
